title: Patient areas not signposted as cardiac-protected or body-protected electrical areas
fullText:
Patient areas that are not signposted as cardiac-protected or body-protected electrical areas shall be upgraded to conform with this Standard, prior to or during alteration or addition to the electrical installation, or to permanently wired equipment.
The requirements of Clause 2.4.1 for separate circuits to patient areas need not apply to alterations to areas not wired as body-protected electrical areas.
NOTE: Those signposted as Class A or Class B electrical areas are not cardiac-protected electrical areas or body-protected electrical areas.
